summary: This document contains multiple certifications of beneficial ownership for various legal entities associated with Jeffrey E. Epstein. Each section outlines the requirements for opening accounts on behalf of these entities, including the identification of beneficial owners and individuals with significant management responsibilities. The document highlights Epstein's role as a key figure in these entities, emphasizing his ownership stakes and management positions.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the president and sole member of several legal entities, including Southern Trust Company, Hyperion Air, and others, indicating his significant involvement in these companies.

persons.name: Caroline Lang
persons.context: Caroline Lang is mentioned as a beneficial owner of Prytanee, LLC, indicating her financial interest in the entity.

persons.name: Etienne Etinant
persons.context: Etienne Etinant is referenced in the context of managing one of the legal entities, although specific details about his role are limited.

connections.description: Caroline Lang is identified as a beneficial owner alongside Jeffrey E. Epstein in Prytanee, LLC.
Etienne Etinant is mentioned in relation to his role in managing one of the entities associated with Epstein.
